snippet: In his first seven days since being called up, the Dodgers’ Yasiel Puig hit 4 home runs and drove in 10 runs. But much of the intrigue surrounding Puig is not on his game, but how little is known about him.
abstract: Los Angeles Dodgers outfielder Yasiel Puig, who hit 4 home runs and drove in 10 runs in his first seven days since being called up, brings vigor to lifeless team, which is last in the National League West.
lead_paragraph: In his first seven days since being called up, the Dodgers’ Yasiel Puig hit 4 home runs and drove in 10 runs. But much of the intrigue surrounding Puig is not on his game, but how little is known about him.

headline.seo: Yasiel Puig Brings Vigor to Lifeless Dodgers
headline.main: Puig Brings Vigor to Lifeless Dodgers
headline.print_headline: Puig Brings Vigor To Lifeless Dodgers
